title: Mobile App Design and Implementation Project for Coronary Artery Disease Patient Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and general knowledge of chronic disease management principles
context.additional_context: A process where pre-service/in-service teachers design and evaluate a mobile app-based self-directed learning program based on real clinical education scenarios, with a focus on developing mobile-optimized content considering environments without PC access.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain coronary artery disease patients' symptom management methods through mobile app interface design
Learners can operationalize preventive behavior change strategies by utilizing in-app patient case analyses and quiz functionalities
Learners can measure the effectiveness of developed educational apps by applying user satisfaction evaluation tools

resources: Educational App Development Kit for Smartphones
Patient Education Materials for Coronary Artery Disease
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
